column4: I just saw in sysinfo that the cpu is running on 1600mhz instead of 2100, how can I fix this?
those cards are supported in ubuntu afaik (althoughti heard problems of link stability with rt61)
that's cpufreq scaling
which cpu?
it's an old CPU, "Athlon XP", it doesn't support speedstepping
sysinfo says AMD Athlon(tm) XP 1900+ but it's a 2600+
you know that the number is no nominal speed; don't you?
yes
it should be 2100mhz
it's an old CPU I've head for years in other computers
install and run as root x86info
x86info says  Family: 6 Model: 8 Stepping: 1 CPU Model : Athlon XP (Thoroughbred)[B0]
maybe I should check the bios setting, could have turned the frequency down after a power shortage or hard shutdown
yep
Sound juicer comes installed
it can't record into mp3
if you install the gstreamer multiverse ugly plus liblame or lame you can
i personally use grip + lame
looks good, thanks
one last question: does anyone pay you to be here and help people?
